H0.text: Carbon dioxide is the gas released when dead organisms and other organic materials decompose.

H1.text: Hydrogen peroxide is the gas released when dead organisms and other organic materials decompose.

H2.text: Carbon monoxide is the gas released when dead organisms and other organic materials decompose.

H3.text: Nitrous oxide is the gas released when dead organisms and other organic materials decompose.

A4.text: Carbon dioxide comprises about 40â€“45% of the gas that emanates from decomposition in landfills (termed 'landfill gas').

A5.text: Anaerobic organisms decompose organic material producing methane and carbon dioxide together with traces of other compounds.
